stripped_text: When the Runner encounters Snoop, reveal all cards in the Runner's grip. Hosted power counter: Reveal all cards in the Runner's grip. Trash 1 of those cards. Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, place 1 power counter on Snoop.
text: When the Runner encounters Snoop, reveal all cards in the Runner's grip. Hosted power counter: Reveal all cards in the Runner's grip. Trash 1 of those cards. [subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, place 1 power counter on Snoop.
title: Snoop
